statement.name: GetSpendingSubVendorsByChecks
statement.sql: SELECT a.check_eft_issued_date as issue_date, a.agency_id, a.agency_name, a.vendor_id, a.vendor_name, b.legal_name AS legal_name_checkbook_sub_vendor, a.prime_vendor_id, c.legal_name AS legal_name_checkbook_prime_vendor, a.check_amount, a.minority_type_id FROM subcontract_spending_details a JOIN subvendor b ON b.vendor_id = a.vendor_id JOIN vendor c ON c.vendor_id = a.prime_vendor_id

statement.name: GetMWBESubvenSpendingByAgencies
GetSubVendorsSpendingByPrimeVendors
statement.sql:
SELECT a.type_of_year AS yeartype_yeartype, a.year_id AS year_year, a.prime_vendor_id AS prime_vendor_prime_vendor, a.prime_minority_type_id AS prime_minority_type, SUM(COALESCE(total_spending_amount,0)) AS check_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(total_contract_amount,0)) AS total_contract_amount_sum, COUNT(DISTINCT a.vendor_id) AS sub_vendor_count, b.legal_name AS prime_vendor_legal_name FROM aggregateon_subven_spending_vendor a JOIN vendor b ON b.vendor_id = a.prime_vendor_id
GROUP BY a.year_id, a.type_of_year, a.prime_vendor_id, a.prime_minority_type_id, b.legal_name

statement.name: GetSubVenSpendingByAgencies
statement.sql:
SELECT s0.type_of_year, s0.year_id, s0.agency_id, COUNT(DISTINCT vendor_id) AS sub_vendor_count, SUM(total_spending_amount) AS ytd_spending_sub_vendors, SUM(total_spending_amount) AS ytd_spending_vendors, r2.check_amount_sum, r2.check_amount_sum_no_payroll, a.agency_name FROM aggregateon_subven_spending_coa_entities s0 JOIN (SELECT s0.year_id, s0.type_of_year, s0.agency_id, SUM(total_spending_amount) AS check_amount_sum, SUM(CASE WHEN spending_category_id !=2 THEN total_spending_amount ELSE 0 END) AS check_amount_sum_no_payroll FROM aggregateon_spending_coa_entities s0
GROUP BY s0.agency_id, s0.year_id, s0.type_of_year) r2 ON r2.agency_id = s0.agency_id AND r2.year_id = s0.year_id AND r2.type_of_year = s0.type_of_year JOIN ref_agency a ON a.agency_id = s0.agency_id
GROUP BY s0.agency_id, s0.year_id, s0.type_of_year, r2.check_amount_sum,r2.check_amount_sum_no_payroll,a.agency_name

statement.name: GetSpendingBySubVendors
statement.sql:
SELECT a.vendor_id AS sub_vendor_sub_vendor, b.legal_name AS sub_vendor_sub_vendor_legal_name, a.prime_vendor_id AS prime_vendor_prime_vendor, c.legal_name AS prime_vendor_prime_vendor_legal_name, a.minority_type_id AS minority_type_minority_type, SUM(COALESCE(total_spending_amount,0)) AS check_amount_sum, SUM(total_sub_contracts) AS total_sub_contracts, SUM(total_spending_amount) AS ytd_spending_sub_vendors FROM aggregateon_subven_spending_vendor a JOIN subvendor b ON b.vendor_id = a.vendor_id JOIN vendor c ON c.vendor_id = a.prime_vendor_id
'N'
'Y'
GROUP BY a.vendor_id, a.minority_type_id, b.legal_name, a.year_id, b.legal_name, c.legal_name, a.prime_vendor_id, a.agency_id

statement.name: GetSubVendorsMWBESpendingBySubContracts
statement.sql:
SELECT a.description AS sub_contract_purpose_sub_contract_purpose, a.document_id AS document_id_document_id, a.agreement_id AS agreement_id_agreement_id, a.vendor_id AS sub_vendor_sub_vendor, b.legal_name AS sub_vendor_sub_vendor_legal_name, a.prime_vendor_id AS prime_vendor_prime_vendor, c.legal_name AS prime_vendor_prime_vendor_legal_name, a.document_id AS sub_contract_number_sub_contract_number, d.original_agreement_id AS sub_contract_number_sub_contract_number_original_agreement_id, SUM(COALESCE(total_spending_amount,0)) AS check_amount_sum FROM aggregateon_subven_spending_contract a JOIN subvendor b ON b.vendor_id = a.vendor_id JOIN vendor c ON c.vendor_id = a.prime_vendor_id JOIN (SELECT distinct original_agreement_id, contract_number FROM agreement_snapshot WHERE latest_flag = 'Y') d ON d.contract_number = a.document_id
GROUP BY a.description, a.document_id, a.agreement_id, a.document_id, a.vendor_id, a.prime_vendor_id, b.legal_name, c.legal_name, d.original_agreement_id
